channel.title: CVE Feed for Pivotal -- Apps Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Pivotal -- Apps Manager

item.title: CVE-2019-3777|2024-09-16T21:56:55.392Z -- pivotal -- apps%20manager
item.description: Pivotal Application Service (PAS), versions 2.2.x prior to 2.2.12, 2.3.x prior to 2.3.7 and 2.4.x prior to 2.4.3, contain apps manager that uses a cloud controller proxy that fails to verify SSL certs. A remote unauthenticated attacker that could hijack the Cloud Controller's DNS record could intercept access tokens sent to the Cloud Controller, giving the attacker access to the user's resources in the Cloud Controller
